    public class Repository<TEntity> : IRepository<TEntity> where TEntity : class

            return DbSet.Find(id);

        {
            return DbSet;
        }

        {
            DbSet.Update(obj);
        }

            DbSet.Remove(DbSet.Find(id));

        public int SaveChanges()

        }

        public void Dispose()

            Db.Dispose();

    }
